meanings: fatigue, weariness, tiredness, exhaustion, 피곤하다 (be) tired, weary, fatigued, exhausted
tired, exhausted, weary, worn out, (formal) fatigued, (S) beat

examples.korean: A wave of tiredness swept over her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 한차례 피곤함이 그녀에게 엄습해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: You look tired. Have you been overworking? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신 피곤해 보여요. 과로하시는 거 아니에요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He was extremely tired but sleep eluded him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 극도로 피곤했으나 잠을 이룰 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was extremely tired but sleep eluded him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: By midweek he was too tired to go out. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 주중이 되자 그는 너무 피곤해서 외출을 할 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She was so tired, her eyelids were beginning to droop. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 너무 피곤해서 눈꺼풀이 아래로 처지기 시작하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
